data.title: Wikipedia
data.text:
Irish software company

For the mathematical group S3, see dihedral group of order 6.

S3 Group is a technology company that has provided software products to operators, OEM's, semiconductors and healthcare providers.[citation needed] Founded in 1986 as Silicon & Software Systems (S3),[1] S3 Group has a history in systems, embedded software and silicon design for consumer, wireless, WiMAX and related applications.[citation needed]

In 2015, the group's "S3 TV Technology" business unit was sold to Accenture,[1][2] and in 2018, the "S3 Semiconductors" division sold to Adesto Technologies.[3] The remaining "S3 Connected Health" unit had, as of 2018, approximately 200 employees.[3]
